about_the_game:
Dive into the tantalizing world of Hentai Senpai: Konbini no Shirigaru Onna! Navigate the bustling aisles of a Japanese convenience store, encountering alluring characters in a series of steamy and captivating puzzles.

🧩 Puzzle Features:

  • Challenge your mind with two classic puzzle types: swapping and rotating. Strategize your moves to uncover the secrets of the seductive Shirigaru Onna!

🔥 Meet the Konbini Beauties:

  • Unlock the secrets of 52 captivating characters, each brimming with charm and sensuality. Discover the hidden desires of the Shirigaru Onna!

🖼️ Sensual Gallery:

  • Explore the allure of the Shirigaru Onna with ease. Delve into the seduction of each character through a user-friendly gallery interface.

❤️ Favorites System:

  • Select your most cherished Shirigaru Onna for quick access and let their beauty enchant you!

📷 Immersive Visuals:

  • Experience the vibrant world of the Konbini no Shirigaru Onna in stunning 5K detail. Let the enticing and playful art captivate your senses!

🎵 Enchanting Soundtrack:

  • Immerse yourself in chill lofi melodies. Let the music of the konbini set the mood for your sultry adventures!

⚙️ Technical Customization:

  • Tailor your gaming experience to your preferences. Fine-tune settings such as resolution, fullscreen mode, framerate, and more. Adapt to the challenges and pleasures ahead!



Embark on a sensual journey through the vibrant world of Hentai Senpai: Konbini no Shirigaru Onna, where your wit and skill in solving puzzles reveal the charm and allure of the Shirigaru Onna.

All characters depicted are adults (18+).

content_descriptors.notes:
Hentai Senpai: Konbini no Shirigaru Onna contains graphic sexual content including nudity, sex, genitalia, masturbation & bodily fluids in a public setting.
All characters are adults (18+).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required for sweet lofi tunes
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.
